name: Coach
description: A high school football coach whoâ€™s tough and always puts the team first.

name: Ellis
description: A young mechanic with a positive attitude and lots of wild stories.

name: Rochelle
description: A TV production assistant who's brave and resourceful.

name: Nick
description: A gambler with a shady past and a sarcastic sense of humor.

name: Bill
description: A Vietnam vet who leads the group with experience and bravery.

name: Zoey
description: A film student turned survivor with quick thinking and a brave heart.

name: Louis
description: An IT guy who adapts quickly and brings humor to the team.

name: Francis
description: A biker with a tough exterior and surprisingly loyal streak.

name: Boomer
description: A bloated infected that vomits bile to attract hordes.

name: Hunter
description: A deadly infected that pounces on survivors from above.

name: Smoker
description: An infected with a long tongue used to ensnare survivors.

name: Tank
description: Massive and powerful, the Tank crushes everything in its path.

name: Charger
description: Charges survivors and slams them into walls or the ground.

name: Jockey
description: Jumps on survivors to steer them into danger.

name: Spitter
description: Spits acid that damages players standing in the area.
